chapter.title: Lighttable
chapter.para: The lighttable is where you manage all your images, ratings, exporting and much more...

sect2.title: Ligthtable
sect2.para: In this view your images are shown as thumbs, each thumb has a frame and while mouse is over an image, information such as rating and if image is untouched or altered. Also when mouse hovers over an imageframe the specific image metadata is shown in the metadata pane.

While mouse is over and imageframe you have additional actions accessed from keyboard to apply on image.
1 - 4 set the rating of the image, if an image has 1 star and you hit the 1 key the image will be unrated
F1 - F3sets a color label for the image
ctrl-ccopy the historystack of the image
ctrl-vapply the copied historystack on the image
eopens the image in darkroom view for developing
zshows a fullscreen view of the image
At the bottom you have an option to choose a zoomable lighttable view or a filemanger view of the thumbnails.

sect3.title: Devices
sect3.para: This plugin show's connected devices, for now this is only cameras but in future scanners would show up here.

sect4.title: Cameras
sect4.para: When a camera is detected it will show up in the device pane, if you hover your mouse over the camera tablabel a tooltip will show with some information about the camera such as model,firmware version and alot more..,
Depending of the support for your camera, buttons with actions will be available such as import images and tethering.

sect5.title: Import images
sect5.para: This will bring up an import dialog, showing the images on camera that can be selected for import into a filmroll in Darktable.

sect5.title: Tethering
sect5.para: Tethering is used to integrate Darktable with your camera, and while you take images on the camera it will automatic be imported into darktable and you can review the result of the shoot, you can also infront of computer setup remote capture jobs for timelapsed captures and change settings such as shuttertime, f-length and more.
Tethering will take you into capture view with the specific camera for tethered shoot read more about tethering in chapter 3.

sect2.title: Filtering and sort order
sect2.para: The filtering and sortorder of images on lighttable are accessed and changed in the top bar where you can select among a few predefined filters and orderering like date, color labels, rating among others.
